description: Designed for use with Canon PowerShot SD700 IS, SD800IS, SD850IS, SD900, SD950IS & SD870IS  digital cameras, this genuine leather carrying case, leather hand strap, Lithium-ion rechargeable battery, and plastic-coated braided metal neck strap make it easy to take take your camera on the road.
title: Canon Digital Elph Accessory Kit for Canon SD990IS, SD970IS, SD880IS, SD800IS, SD890IS, SD950IS, SD900, SD870IS, SD850IS & SD790IS Digital Cameras
